rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with ample storage and a coat check area. Features are designed to ensure smooth transition from the outdoor to indoor space.

An open-plan living area combined with the kitchen. The layout incorporates a Mediterranean aesthetic with natural stone finishes, wooden accents and large windows for ample natural light. Vastu principles have been considered to maintain positive energy flow.
A designated dining space adjacent to the living area that can be used for meals and gatherings. The design maintains an open feel while ensuring functionality.
The two-car garage is situated on the side of the plot with easy access from the entrance hall. It includes parking spots and space for storage.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to align with Vastu principles, allowing a positive flow of energy into the house.
Large window openings in the living area and kitchen providing natural light while ensuring proper ventilation as per local building norms.
A direct opening to the garden area, designed with Vastu principles for enhancing the connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.
